stimulusHtml: Find ∫ 0 24 v ( t ) dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4202@ . Using correct units, explain the meaning of ∫ 0 24 v ( t ) dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4202@ .

features.html: A car is traveling on a straight road. For  0≤t≤24 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CAB@ seconds, the car's velocity v(t), in meters per second, is modeled by the piecewise-linear function defined by the graph above.
